---
name: NourseothricinR
creator: keoni
description: Nourseothricin resistance gene (natR)
prefix: CGCT
suffix: ACTC
sequence: 
---

Gene encoding streptothricin acetyltransferase that confers resistance to nourseothricin (ClonNAT) antibiotic. Enables selection of transformed yeast cells on nourseothricin-containing media.
